meanings.definition: A preliminary model or version of a product or system.
meanings.sent1: The team used prototyping to test their new game design.
meanings.sent2: Prototyping is essential in the development of new technology.
meanings.sent3: The prototyping phase revealed flaws in the initial design.
meanings.sent4: Her sketch was like a prototyping of the final painting.
meanings.sent5: The company's success was attributed to their innovative prototyping methods.

meanings.definition: The act or process of creating a prototype.
meanings.sent1: Prototyping requires attention to detail and creativity.
meanings.sent2: We learned about prototyping in our engineering class.
meanings.sent3: The team's prototyping session turned into a fun competition.
meanings.sent4: His approach to problem-solving was like a careful prototyping.
meanings.sent5: The prototyping workshop inspired many new ideas among the participants.

meanings.definition: To create a prototype of a product or system.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys prototyping new apps for her phone.
meanings.sent2: Prototyping allows for quick adjustments before final production.
meanings.sent3: The team will start prototyping the new software next week.
meanings.sent4: He began prototyping the robot with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: Prototyping the website helped identify user interface issues early on.
